duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive responsibility over all functional areas of the plant operations, including production, maintenance, safety, shipping, receiving, and scheduling.
Administer contracts with service providers and motivate managers to enhance the skill level of their Team Members.
Review cost and performance data to determine areas in need of improvement and compile a weekly efficiency report.
Ensure food safety, food quality, and legality compliance, and execute all capital improvements for the facility.
Initiate discussions and implementations of production improvements and assist in identifying, evaluating, and correcting problems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Food Science, Food Manufacturing, or related field (Master's preferred)
